facet_1.name: Soothing Saplings
facet_1.effects: Sprout grants a soothing and healing aura within the ring of trees for its duration. Affects buildings.

effects: Applies a debuff that roots and disarms affected enemy units
The debuff duration increases incrementally per affected enemy unit
Grants the Curse of the Oldgrowth ability
Applies an exposing debuff on all enemy heroes within the radius and slowing them
The debuff also deals damage over time based on the number of trees surrounding the affected enemy hero

level_15: +30 Sprout Heal per Second/+1 Nature's Profit Gold Bag per Interval

abilities.name: Spirit of the Forest
abilities.description: Grants the Prophet bonus base attack damage per tree within the proximity radius.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Wrath of Nature. The Prophet's Treants are considered as valid trees.

abilities.name: Nature's Profit
abilities.description: Facet-specific ability that spawns gold bags when enemy heroes die near Nature's Prophet
abilities.details: Only available with Nature's Profit facet

ability_1.name: Sprout
ability_1.details: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, while providing a vision radius slightly larger than the tree ring radius.
ability_1.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, while providing a vision radius slightly larger than the tree ring radius.
technical_details: Deals damage within 275 radius upon cast
interaction_notes: Cannot be cast on Ancient creeps, Buildings (except Ancients), Ward-type units, Hidden units, Invulnerable units

ability_2.name: Teleportation
ability_2.details: The Prophet may globally teleports to any point on the map. Grants the Prophet an all damage barrier upon a successful teleportation.
ability_2.description: The Prophet may globally teleports to any point on the map. Grants the Prophet an all damage barrier upon a successful teleportation.
interaction_notes: Visual and sound effects visible to enemies during cast

ability_3.name: Nature's Call
ability_3.details: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of the Prophet.
ability_3.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of the Prophet.
interaction_notes: Destroys all trees in radius regardless of number of Treants summoned

ability_4.name: Curse of the Oldgrowth
ability_4.details: Applies an exposing debuff on all enemy heroes within the radius and slowing them. The debuff also deals damage over time based on the number of trees surrounding the affected enemy hero.
ability_4.description: Applies an exposing debuff on all enemy heroes within the radius and slowing them. The debuff also deals damage over time based on the number of trees surrounding the affected enemy hero.
interaction_notes: Considers Treants as trees regardless of faction

ability_5.name: Wrath of Nature
ability_5.details: A damaging energy that bounces around globally, striking enemy units close to the point-targeted location within the Prophet's vision radius. The damage increases incrementally per bounce.
ability_5.description: A damaging energy that bounces around globally, striking enemy units close to the point-targeted location within the Prophet's vision radius. The damage increases incrementally per bounce.
interaction_notes: Can only affect same unit once per cast
Scepter adds root and disarm with increasing duration

changes: Increased Nature's Profit hero level to gold factor from 1.5 to 2
Reduced Sprout Soothing Saplings tree enchant radius from 1200 to 900
Reduced Wrath of Nature base damage from 100/140/180 to 90/130/170
Reduced Teleportation damage barrier from 100/150/200/250 to 70/130/190/250
Talents: LVL 15 +100 Teleportation damage barrier â†’ +30% Sprout heal per second/+1 Nature's Profit gold bag per interval
Reduced Spirit of the Forest base attack damage bonus per tree from 4% to 3%
Reduced Greater Treant health from 800/1050/1300/1550 to 750/950/1150/1350
